original_title: Hell is for Heroes: Live at the Sheffield Leadmill
overview: Recorded live at the Sheffield Leadmill in October 2004, Hell for Heroes' only DVD, is a demonstration of intensity, emotion and intelligent musicianship, featuring some of their best songs, including 'Out of Sight', 'Three of Clubs' and 'Kamichi'.
title: Hell is for Heroes: Live at the Sheffield Leadmill
